function.name: sort
function.description: Will sort the input array, optional argument is a function to decide sorting order

function.name: map
function.description: Will perform the argument function for each element of tey array and return a new array

function.name: split
function.description: Will split the string into an array, optional seperator can be passed

function.name: toUpperCase
function.description: Will convert string to uppercase, no arguments needed
